channel.title: Massacred World, Quest For A PERFECT PK Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/20ppvrn.png[/img]
Welcome To The Massacred World Project Thread.
I intend to make this server as fun as possible, check out spoilers to view information/pictures and please post with anything you think needs improving or updating.
[B][U]Why Did You Make It?[/U][/B] After my favourite server died off, I was extremely bored and looking for a fun server that I could play; that wouldn't make me level for days just to lose some gear and quit. So I decided to make my own - one that would be fun, and addictive. Here it is!
[B][U]Whats Your Base?[/U][/B] The base is new era, although you can hardly tell due to the adaptions ive taken to try and get this server perfect.
[B][U]What Is Unique?[/U][/B] There are loads of unique features in this server, especially compared to another rubbish soulsplit leach. This server has got PvP tasks, random artifact drops, personalised firecape keeping on IP and loads more.
[B][U]Your Experience?[/U][/B] I worked for about 2 years with delta/allstar, until I realised how rubbish the potential on them are. Thats when I started this project (about 5 months ago) and when I first started on project insanity based servers. So yes, I have little experience with PI but im getting better.
[B][U]Features[/U][/B] [CODE]- Unique PvP artifact drop system - Unique PvP armor drop system - Complete PvP world - PvP tasks - Ability to get a main task - Ability to get a zerker task - Ability to get a pure task - Unique shop items tailored for PK - 3 Bosses with unique drops - All 474 animations, gfx, items - Perfect combat - No overpowered weapons/armors - Items keep on death (firecape, void etc) - Items become free after one buy - Donator tab with spec refill and more - Unique donator isle with shopmaster - Loads more![/CODE]
[B][U]Update Log[/U][/B] [CODE] 26 Oct 2010: Added a massively improved tutorial system 26 Oct 2010: Added barrelchest boss tele for donators 26 Oct 2010: Removed all glory teleports 26 Oct 2010: Changed edge tele to varrock tele 25 Oct 2010: Added full EP system 25 Oct 2010: Fixed the mute commands 24 Oct 2010: Removed unnecessary code from the process 24 Oct 2010: Improved bandos boots stats 24 Oct 2010: Corrected login screen information 23 Oct 2010: Added random event with rewards 23 Oct 2010: Added fullscreen login screen 22 Oct 2010: Removed unnecessary sendMessages 22 Oct 2010: Added rules interface when you make a new acc 22 Oct 2010: Added all hilt drops etc to KBD/Chaos ele 21 Oct 2010: Added godsword block emotes 21 Oct 2010: Added anchor with correct models gfx etc 21 Oct 2010: Added all darts into stores 20 Oct 2010: Fixed crystal bow glitch 20 Oct 2010: Added new items in pkp store 19 Oct 2010: Fixed black dhide item requirements 19 Oct 2010: Gave option for people to add starter to bank 19 Oct 2010: Made vengeance save to character file 18 Oct 2010: Added halloween event 17 Oct 2010: Added highscoreboard 17 Oct 2010: Added multi zone at edge 16 Oct 2010: Fixed void helms hair glitch 16 Oct 2010: Fixed prayer icon glitching 16 Oct 2010: Created development thread [/CODE]
[B][U]Pictures[/U][/B]
Dialogue [IMG]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/4956/pvptasks.png[/img] [IMG]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/690/kdrrating.png[/img] [IMG]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/5687/nobuy.png[/img][IMG]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/5038/ancientstatbuy.png[/img] [IMG]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/6303/teleports.png[/img][IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/5540/kbddrops.png[/img][IMG]http://img229.imageshack.us/img229/3166/80orhigher2fight.png[/img] [IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/4047/teletodonar.png[/img]
Boss Drops [IMG]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/9236/lunargear.png[/img][IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/2874/moonclangear.png[/img] [IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/6589/dragongear.png[/img][IMG]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/1874/solandarcanegear.png[/img]
Magic Tabs [IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/5585/normmag.png[/img][IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/1046/lunarmag.png[/img][IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/8733/ancientmag.png[/img]
Donator Features [IMG]http://img299.imageshack.us/img299/2702/donartabz.png[/img] [IMG]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/5710/symbolse.png[/img]
New 474 Content [IMG]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/5192/skillcapeemotes.png[/img][IMG]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/2635/zombiehand.png[/img][IMG]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/985/oldschooldancing.png[/img]
Other! [IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/2311/firecape.png[/img] [IMG]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/5545/image3rs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2hrcuit.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/15hcphv.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2zggk5e.png[/img] Halloween Event! [IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/5366/46813684.png[/img] [IMG]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/2508/74665819.png[/img] [IMG]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/2294/27173670.png[/img] [IMG]http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/7352/34693465.png[/img] [IMG]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/1889/80012374.png[/img]
[B]Thanks for checking out my topic![/B] Feel free to PM me if your interested in something specific![/center]

item.title: Massacred World, Quest For A PERFECT PK Server
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[CENTER]

20ppvrn.png700×160

Welcome To The Massacred World Project Thread.

I intend to make this server as fun as possible, check out spoilers to view information/pictures and please post with anything you think needs improving or updating.

Why Did You Make It?
After my favourite server died off, I was extremely bored and looking for a fun server that I could play; that wouldn’t make me level for days just to lose some gear and quit. So I decided to make my own - one that would be fun, and addictive. Here it is!

Whats Your Base?
The base is new era, although you can hardly tell due to the adaptions ive taken to try and get this server perfect.

What Is Unique?
There are loads of unique features in this server, especially compared to another rubbish soulsplit leach. This server has got PvP tasks, random artifact drops, personalised firecape keeping on IP and loads more.

Your Experience?
I worked for about 2 years with delta/allstar, until I realised how rubbish the potential on them are. Thats when I started this project (about 5 months ago) and when I first started on project insanity based servers. So yes, I have little experience with PI but im getting better.

Features

[CODE]- Unique PvP artifact drop system

  • Unique PvP armor drop system
  • Complete PvP world
  • PvP tasks
  • Ability to get a main task
  • Ability to get a zerker task
  • Ability to get a pure task
  • Unique shop items tailored for PK
  • 3 Bosses with unique drops
  • All 474 animations, gfx, items
  • Perfect combat
  • No overpowered weapons/armors
  • Items keep on death (firecape, void etc)
  • Items become free after one buy
  • Donator tab with spec refill and more
  • Unique donator isle with shopmaster
  • Loads more![/CODE]

Update Log

26 Oct 2010: Added a massively improved tutorial system
26 Oct 2010: Added barrelchest boss tele for donators
26 Oct 2010: Removed all glory teleports
26 Oct 2010: Changed edge tele to varrock tele
25 Oct 2010: Added full EP system
25 Oct 2010: Fixed the mute commands
24 Oct 2010: Removed unnecessary code from the process
24 Oct 2010: Improved bandos boots stats
24 Oct 2010: Corrected login screen information
23 Oct 2010: Added random event with rewards
23 Oct 2010: Added fullscreen login screen
22 Oct 2010: Removed unnecessary sendMessages
22 Oct 2010: Added rules interface when you make a new acc
22 Oct 2010: Added all hilt drops etc to KBD/Chaos ele
21 Oct 2010: Added godsword block emotes
21 Oct 2010: Added anchor with correct models gfx etc
21 Oct 2010: Added all darts into stores
20 Oct 2010: Fixed crystal bow glitch
20 Oct 2010: Added new items in pkp store
19 Oct 2010: Fixed black dhide item requirements
19 Oct 2010: Gave option for people to add starter to bank
19 Oct 2010: Made vengeance save to character file
18 Oct 2010: Added halloween event
17 Oct 2010: Added highscoreboard
17 Oct 2010: Added multi zone at edge
16 Oct 2010: Fixed void helms hair glitch
16 Oct 2010: Fixed prayer icon glitching
16 Oct 2010: Created development thread

Pictures

Dialogue




Boss Drops

Magic Tabs

Donator Features

New 474 Content

Other!


2hrcuit.jpg764×348



Halloween Event!




Thanks for checking out my topic!
Feel free to PM me if your interested in something specific![/center]

Read full topic
